purpose: To enable developers to build AI agents through a collaborative hackathon environment with Microsoft and Azure.
principle: Leverages Azure cloud services and AI frameworks to provide a platform for developing and deploying AI agents.
reusability: Designed for hackathon participants to create AI agents, with examples and templates for quick setup and deployment.
limitations: Primarily focused on hackathon use cases; may not be suitable for production-scale applications without further development.
name: AI_Agents_Hackathon
description: A free virtual hackathon for building AI agents with Microsoft and Azure.
highlight: Facilitates the creation and deployment of AI agents using Azure services.
